record.title: CHILDREN'S HEALTH INSURANCE PROGRAM REAUTHORIZATION ACT OF 2007--MOTION TO PROCEED
record.narrative:
CHILDREN'S HEALTH INSURANCE PROGRAM REAUTHORIZATION ACT OF 2007--MOTION TO PROCEED -- (Senate - November 01, 2007)

[Page: S13653]
record.chair: Under the previous order, the Senate will resume consideration of the motion to proceed to H.R. 3963, which the clerk will report.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A motion to proceed to the bill (H.R. 3963) to amend title XXI of the Social Security Act to extend and improve the Children's Health Insurance Program, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent to speak as in morning business.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
